comment._content: Oi! Sou administrador de um grupo chamado UTE 2000 (CP) e nós adoraríamos ter isto adicionado ao grupo!

comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: Are these new units being inspected?  When would this have been - 1950s?  1960s?

comment.author: 25105996@N02
comment._content:
These units are being sent to Argentina. A few of them still in Portugal at Entroncamento depot.
The photograph was taken around 1956.
